data.message: Dear Facebook: I love Facebook, How Ever that stupid "messenger" is such a waste of time, really who has time to switch back & forth to write, read, to another page!... It's very inconvenient, annoying, isn't beneficial at all is it to the Facebook Corporation  in any way?... Really do the Facebook community a great favor and remove it Please!🙏....Please...!!!!

replies.message: Hey Maritza. What would make your Messenger experience more enjoyable? Let us know here: http://on.fb.me/XIVrNf. -Sarah
